text: Shaun Sharif Bailey, Baron Bailey of Paddington (born May 1971) is a British politician. He has been a member of the London Assembly since 2016. He is a member of the Conservative Party. He was the party's candidate for Mayor of London in the 2021 election. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Life Peers Category:Politicians from London
title: Shaun Bailey, Baron Bailey of Paddington
